__e: For all I know, we're the only ones still left in the fight.
It means we're not the only ones left... to know what love is.
We're the only ones still here.
The only ones who know about that are the three of us, soon to be the two of us.
But you and me, we're the only ones who see it coming.
Well, right now they're the only ones who don't know that.
I don't want them to come out, 'cause they're the only ones I got.
Because that's who you'll be talking to if you ever pull something like that again.
I'm telling you that the only people who could tell you what really happened are the people who want you to forget.
You mean, too much for one guy alone?
We'll forget about it... if you'll remember that there's only one man that means anything to me.
It's too much for one person.
I have lost my son, my only son.
Would you not for your only son?
Now, I would like to stay and watch you marry my only son.
So the only people who knew you were alive were
The only people who have any connection to your child are there, so we will be too.
We're the only ones that know what happened.
For the only person she ever loved... she wants him to be happy even when she's not here anymore.
You're one of the only people in the world who looks me in the eye when they talk to me.
I may not have much and I may never have a lot but I've got something inside that I want to give to the only person that means something to me.
Do you know what, Nurse? It is. You don't get that in them fancy new flats, do you?
It seems life has thrown enough at you for one day.
I love your daughter, and I don't want a day to go by where I'm not with her.
They're there for one reason and one reason only.
And people like you only come down here for one reason, money.
- But I'm here for one reason and one reason only:
